rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard your hand.
Demonlord Orbisfaber can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
When Demonlord Orbisfaber enters, if it was cast and isn't an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one.

Topend Finisher/Combo
